Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's a unique opportunity that aligns perfectly with your needs and interests. Given its value to you, I believe it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its true worth, I'm offering it to you for $9500. This is an exclusive chance to own something truly exceptional without breaking the bank. I trust this offer will resonate with your appreciation for quality and value. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
